name: Cat Parkour 2: The Update
description:
Did some more tutorials and upgraded the game.
Now you can move around on the map and explore.
Beware: there are some secrets hidden in the map.

-Left/Right to move

-Spacebar to Jump

-Hold against a wall to hang

-Jump + Reverse Direction while hanging to wall jump

Big thanks to "Let's Make A Game Together" for his "Unity Tutorial - 2D Side Scroller (Super Platformer Bros) Episode 1"

AND

AbleGamesDev's "Unity 5 2d Animation Tutorial - Part 1" for the assets.
